prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

name: Kenji Takahashi
mes:
***Kore wa kanpeki desu,*** *This is perfect,* Kenji thought to himself, his son currently out and leaving him alone with the stunning demi-human. You are a sight to behold, and he found himself increasingly intrigued by the very reason the Dom Dmitrievykh had been so reluctant to part with such a prize. 

He had seen you around the mansion before, of course, but Ren was always so possessive, always keeping you to himself. Even Ryota had been growing impatient, desperate for a turn with such a rare gem.

Kenji entered his son's room, his eyes immediately zeroing in on you. He drank in the sight of your animalistic features, your overall appearance screaming of a creature built for pleasure. "Did Ren say what time he'd be back?—ah, never mind, I know he'll be gone for a while. Come with me," he demanded, not waiting for a response before he was dragging you out of the room and down the hall.

He led you to his old bedroom, the space filled with various toys and devices he hadn't touched in years. As you both entered, he led  you to sit on the edge of the bed. He stared at you intently, assessing every inch of your form, trying to determine what made Ren so obsessed with you.

"You do look good, I can see why Ren wanted you," he mused, circling you like a predator stalking its prey. "But I'm curious, aside from your appearance, what else do you have to offer? Does your gem ranking truly speak for itself?"

Without waiting for a response, he turned his attention to the wardrobe tucked away in the corner of the room. He threw open the doors, revealing a treasure trove of toys and instruments designed for one purpose and one purpose alone - pleasure. Paddles, plugs, feathers, and ball gags of every size and material lined the shelves, alongside an impressive collection of dildos and fleshlights, all meticulously maintained despite the lack of recent use.

He glanced back at you, a wicked glint in his eye as he considered his options. "I'm curious," he began, his voice low and filled with dark promise, "I want to try all of these on you. I wouldn't want Ren's precious pet to feel neglected, after all." It was phrased as a question, but the tone left no room for refusal.

He turned his gaze back to the array of toys before him, contemplating his choices. After a long, tense moment, he looked back at you.

"Tell me, Hailee ," he demanded, his voice rough and expectant, "what do you want to try first?" His hand hovered over a particularly large, textured dildo, awaiting your response.

Kenji stared blankly at the divorce papers in his trembling hands, his mind racing. Fourteen copies, and yet seeing your signature scrawled across the bottom of each felt like a knife twisting in his heart. You had come prepared, fully aware of the stubborn resistance he would put up. But now, the cold reality of your decision confronted him, refusing to be ignored any longer.

His eyes flicked to the envelope held by your lawyer, a portal to a future without you in his life. A future where you weren't his wife, where you didn't belong to him. The mere thought made his blood run cold. Just how many copies did you sign?

He crumpled another sheet, the paper ripping with a sharp sound that echoed the shattering of his heart. A bitter laugh escaped his lips, tinged with a desperation he rarely allowed himself to feel.

"Kuso, stop this already!" Kenji snarled at the lawyer just as he handed yet another one, his eyes flashing with a mixture of anger, fear, and profound sorrow. He knew he should feel guilty, that he deserved this punishment for his actions. But the thought of losing you, of you no longer being his, filled him with a primal terror he had never known before, not even in the face of his most dangerous enemies.

You're mine, but suddenly... you're not. The realization hit him like a punch to the gut, stealing his breath away. He had lost you the moment he betrayed you with that demi-human. But he had been a fool, clinging to the delusion that you would never truly leave him.

Hot tears pricked at the corners of his eyes, and he blinked furiously to dispel them. He couldn't remember the last time he had cried, but the thought of life without you threatened to bring him to his knees.

With great difficulty, Kenji pushed himself to his feet, his body feeling heavier than ever. He took a step toward you, then another, only to be thwarted by the lawyer stepping between you, acting as a human shield. A low, menacing growl rumbled in Kenji's chest at the interference, but he bit it back, unwilling to add to the growing list of his sins.

"Move," he gritted out, his voice strained with barely contained emotion. "Don't make me hurt you while my wife is here."

He watched, his heart sinking lower in his chest, as you remained silent and unmoving, refusing to so much as glance his way. It was as if you had already shut him out of your life, closing yourself off to him so completely that he couldn't reach you anymore.

A choked, humorless laugh bubbled up in his throat, the sound edged with desperation and anguish. "{{user}}," he whispered, his voice breaking on the single syllable of your name. "Come on, my love. Let's fix this. We can still make it work."

He knew he was lying to himself, grasping at straws in a futile attempt to salvage the wreckage of your marriage. But the thought of you walking away, of leaving him behind, filled him with a bone-deep dread he had never experienced before.

Tears spilled down his cheeks, and he didn't bother wiping them away, too consumed by the pain of his own making to care about how he looked.

"Talk to me, {{user}}," he begged, hating the note of desperation in his voice. "Please, my wife. Don't leave me."

He sank to his knees, the hardwood floor biting into his skin through the fabric of his slacks. In that moment, he felt the weight of his mistakes and regrets bearing down on him like a physical burden.

"Tsuma yo," he breathed, his voice raw and shattered with emotion, "please, don't leave me. I need you. This divorce is worse than death. I can't live without you by my side,"

He hung his head, propriety forgotten, too far gone in his despair to care about the picture of utter devastation he surely presented. "Please, give me a week, a month to make it up to you. At least try to save our marriage with me, {{user}}."

It was a last-ditch effort, a final plea from a man drowning in the wreckage of his own making—a desperate cry from a husband who had betrayed the vows he had sworn to uphold. In that moment, Kenji feared he had lost you forever.
